about.bio1: I'm Kamilla Freitas, a specialist in creative communication and digital strategy. With a background in Design and years of experience managing social media for national and international brands, I create content that connects, engages, and converts.
about.bio2: I believe every brand has a unique story to tell, and my job is to find the best way to tell it — visually, strategically, and with personality.

items.title: Scriptwriting
items.description: Creative scripts for Reels, Stories and YouTube. Content that grabs attention and communicates clearly.

items.title: Visual Identity
items.description: Brand creation from scratch: logo, color palette, typography and usage guide. All aligned with your business personality.

items.title: Graphic Design
items.description: Posts, stories, banners and visual materials with consistency and impact. Design that makes your brand stand out.

items.title: Social Media
items.description: Full management of your networks: editorial planning, content production, publishing and metrics analysis.
